turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need you to order me a pizza from Metro.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I found two locations near you. Do you have a preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, Id like a pizza from the Metro on Horizon Ridge in Henderson

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Specialty Gotham Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a Large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and how many?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just one large please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any special requests for your pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Instead of the ground beef I would like ham please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I can substitue the ham for the gound beef. Any other topping?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be in thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, I have ordered you one large Gotham Pizza. I have added ham instead of ground pizza. This will be at the Metro Pizza on Horizon Ridge.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, sound right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything else with your pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the one pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to you via text on your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: May I assist you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: NO, goodbye for now. Thanks.
